author: potuz
content:
Probably it's best to move this to the prysm discord server if it's specific to it. You can look into this branch https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/13917

That's what's effectively been committed. A good starting point perhaps would be to add tests to this PR that I have stale in lieu of other things: https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/pull/13989
